briefTitle: Comparison of Processed Nerve Allograft and Collagen Nerve Cuffs for Peripheral Nerve Repair
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Prospective, Randomized, Subject and Evaluator Blinded Comparative Study of Nerve Cuffs and AvanceÂ® Nerve Graft Evaluating Recovery Outcomes for the Repair of Nerve Discontinuities
summary: Processed Nerve Allograft and Collagen Nerve Cuffs will be compared to assess safety and functional outcomes for the repair of nerve injuries in the hand.

primaryOutcome.measure: Static Two-Point Discrimination (Pre-defined Mixed Modeling Approach)
